description:
Announcing The Bristol and Bath ACCU Meetup Winter Social!

Friday the 3rd March, 7:30 pm @ Zerodegrees Microbrewery Restaurant (53 Colston St, Bristol BS1 5BA)

The majority of votes were to go to Zerodegrees, which for those that haven't been, is a really nice microbrewery and restaurant (link: [here](https://www.zerodegrees.co.uk/)). Zerodegrees is easily accessible from the City Centre.

Let's meet at 7:30 pm (at Zerodegrees) and we can take the evening from there :-) ! Once we have an idea of numbers, I'll look into booking a table.

Looking forward to seeing you and have a good weekend,

Jim
title: ACCU Bristol and Bath Winter Social!
